GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

BRANCH_DETAILS.title: Branch Details
BRANCH_DETAILS.instruction: Write the name of the Bank, the specific Branch name, and the City where you are submitting this complaint form.

CUST_NAME.title: Customer Name
CUST_NAME.instruction: Write your full name as it appears on your bank account.

ACCOUNT_NO.title: Account Number
ACCOUNT_NO.instruction: Enter the bank account number linked to the card you used.

CARD_NO.title: Debit/ATM Card Number
CARD_NO.instruction: Enter the 16-digit number printed on the card used for the failed transaction.

ATM_ID_LOC.title: ATM ID / Location
ATM_ID_LOC.instruction: Write the ATM ID (usually found on the machine or the slip). If you don't have the ID, write the exact location (e.g., 'Main Market Branch ATM').

ATM_BANK_NAME.title: ATM Bank Name
ATM_BANK_NAME.instruction: Write the name of the bank that owns the ATM machine where you faced the issue.

COMPLAINT_AMT_REQ.title: Amount Requested
COMPLAINT_AMT_REQ.instruction: How much money did you TRY to withdraw?
rejections: Amount missing for cash withdrawal complaint

COMPLAINT_AMT_DISBURSED.title: Amount Actually Disbursed
COMPLAINT_AMT_DISBURSED.instruction: How much cash ACTUALLY came out of the machine? (Write '0' if no cash came out).

COMPLAINT_AMT_DEBITED.title: Amount Debited
COMPLAINT_AMT_DEBITED.instruction: How much money was cut from your account balance?

COMPLAINT_AMT_DISPUTED.title: Amount Disputed
COMPLAINT_AMT_DISPUTED.instruction: What is the total amount you are claiming? (This is usually the difference between what was cut and what you received).
rejections: Disputed amount is zero or missing

TRANS_DATE.title: Date of Transaction
TRANS_DATE.instruction: Enter the date when the problem occurred (DD-MM-YYYY).

TRANS_NO_TIME.title: Transaction No. and Time
TRANS_NO_TIME.instruction: Enter the Transaction Reference Number (from SMS or slip) and the approximate Time of the incident.

CARD_CAPTURE_STATUS.title: Card Captured by ATM?
CARD_CAPTURE_STATUS.instruction: Tick 'Yes' if the machine swallowed your card and did not return it. Otherwise, tick 'No'.

OTHER_COMPLAINTS.title: Other Complaints
OTHER_COMPLAINTS.instruction: If you have a different issue (not cash or card capture), describe it here.

CONTACT_NO.title: Contact Number
CONTACT_NO.instruction: Enter your mobile number so the bank can contact you regarding this complaint.

SIGNATURE.title: Customer Signature
SIGNATURE.instruction: Sign here to officially lodge the complaint.
